name: DailyFacts
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Most fact skills blurt out boring facts in Alexa's monotonous voice.
With Daily Facts (US) we aim to prove high quality, intelligent and professionally narrated US based facts.
Simply add the Daily Facts skill and ask for your flash briefing.
Daily Facts are updated daily. (duh)
Narrated By provotalent, built by VoiceTech.
Please note that we may run up to one (just one) advert a week (on days where we do, you will get two facts), this is to cover our costs.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
